data.text:

Drop off your items at one of LuggageHero’s luggage storage locations just around the corner.

Pricing

LuggageHero is the ONLY luggage storage service that offers you a choice of hourly or daily rates in Santiago Bernabéu.

A flat rate starting at €1 per hour and from €4.5 per day allows you to pick an option that will best suit your needs. If you’re only planning on staying for a few hours in a city, why pay for an entire day as you would with other luggage storage services?

Santiago Bernabéu Stadium

Santiago Bernabéu stadium locates in the capital of Spain, Madrid. It is the home ground for a well-known football team Real Madrid and at the same time, it is the second largest stadium in Spain. The stadium was named after the president of Real Madrid, who was president from 1943 to 1978. Several important football matches have been hosted here, such as the European Cup, the UEFA Champions League, and the Copa Libertadores.

Before heading to a football match, look at the stadium’s bag and security policy to avoid unnecessary complications.

What you can and cannot bring inside Santiago Bernabéu

There are no cloakrooms at the stadium.

Allowed bags:

There is not an official bag policy for the stadium but be aware that bags are checked before entering the stadium and the smaller bag is, the better.

Prohibited items:

no food or drinks in metal packaging, glass, ceramics or wood that is over 500ml

alcoholic beverages, narcotics, psychoactive drugs, stimulants

strollers

weapons

flares, fireworks

It is not possible to leave and re-enter the stadium, so make sure to store your luggage safely with LuggageHero near the stadium and go have fun!

LuggageHero can store your belongings close to Santiago Bernabéu

At LuggageHero, we offer secure and cheap luggage storage just near this stadium. All our shops are certified by LuggageHero.

Until recently, travelers could only stow their bags in these luggage lockers, offering little flexibility regarding pricing, where to go, and luggage deposit.

Also, LuggageHero offers stores in countless places so that you always have the option of dropping off your luggage in a safe environment. Unlike luggage lockers in stations and airports, LuggageHero offers both hourly and daily rates. LuggageHero strives to offer flexible and cheap luggage storage near you at all times.

We store all kinds of luggage – any size and any shape in verified stores

LuggageHero’s users can store luggage of any size and/or shape in our storage locations. It doesn’t matter if it is ski equipment, photo equipment, or backpacks. In other words, you can get baggage storage, suitcase storage, luggage deposit, or whatever our satisfied customers call it safely as we accommodate it all. LuggageHero’s customers can choose to be charged by the hour or our daily rate, regardless of what they store.

LuggageHero redefines convenience for travelers. Take advantage of our generous baggage allowance and leave your luggage and carry-on bags in our secure, innovative, and environmentally friendly locker storage. You can easily bounce into our store and embark on adventures unburdened by heavy luggage!

We have a variety of stores with different opening hours, so choose what fits you best! Go and pick the store here to see the opening hours.

Which payment methods are accepted?

All major credit cards are accepted. Be aware that the shops do not receive cash when using LuggageHero, and remember that the insurance on your luggage is valid only if the payment has been made directly to LuggageHero.

Cancellation of booking

For same-day cancellations, a fee of €5.00/$5.00/£5.00/DKK30.00 per bag will be charged for the booking, and for no-shows, a fee equal to the daily rate at the selected storage location will be charged starting at €4.5 per bag.
